HERO.subtitle: I build web applications.
HERO.introduction:
I’m a Frontend Developer with experience in digital marketing.

I create applications from the beginning to the end: the business idea, the design, the development and the monetization.

ABOUT.title: About Me
ABOUT.description1: Hi! My name is Èric, I live in Barcelona and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. Everything started in 2020 when I enrolled in a program for young people to learn how to make mobile apps and found tech start ups. There I started seriously in software development.
ABOUT.description2: I am a hybrid profile. I studied marketing and communication in the University and I combine this knowledge with my coding skills to improve the development and have a global vision of the projects. Therefore, I focus my websites to improve the conversion rate of leads and sales.
